items.text: Let little ones laugh and play — a vibrant, safe playroom designed for fun and imagination.
Take a breather in the garden – coffee in the morning, the silence of the mountains and space that calms your thoughts.
Indulge in the ultimate relaxation — our luxurious jacuzzi invites you to soak, unwind, and enjoy mountain views in total comfort.
Relax and socialize in our elegant lounge — complete with a complimentary bar for you to enjoy your favorite drinks, anytime.
Fast and reliable internet throughout the villa.
Secure on-site parking available to all guests.
Enjoy our quiet garden and mountain surroundings.
Complimentary whisky, coffee in our lounge, all with your kids in sight.
Optional breakfast delivered to your door.

intro.subtitle: WHAT TO EXPECT AT WILLA ZOFIÓWKA
intro.title: Stay in comfort and style
intro.p1: Willa Zofiówka invites you to enjoy a thoughtfully curated experience in the heart of Zakopane. Our rooms combine regional charm with soft modern touches – natural wood, warm textures, and cozy lighting throughout.
intro.p2: With a variety of room types and upgraded amenities, you'll find your perfect space for rest after mountain adventures, family moments, or quiet escapes.
intro.p3: Prices may vary. Rates depend on availability, number of adults/children, and length of stay. Every direct reservation gets 20% off. If you have already visited us, contact us directly and we will provide you an exclusive discount.
